#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    double x;
    long long t,n,r,y,temp,count;;
    cin>>t;
    
    while(t--)
    {
        x = 1.0;
        scanf("%lld%lld",&n,&r);
        for (long long i=1;i<=r;i++)
        {
            x *= double(n-r+i)/double(i);
        }    
        y = ( long long) x;   
        if (x - y > .5)
        y++;
        
        temp = y;
        count =0;
        while (temp > 0)
        {
            temp/=10;
            count++;
        }
        printf("%lld ",count);
        count =0;
        temp = y;
        while (temp>0)
        {
            temp = temp>>1;
            count++;
        }        
        printf("%lld\n",count);
    }
    return 0;
}
